lines: mahaashay dayaanaath ko jab rama ke naukar ho jaane ka haal maaloom hua to bahut khush hue
vivaah hote hee vah itanee jald chetega isakee unhen aasha na thee
bole jagah to achchhee hai
eemaanadaaree se kaam karoge to kisee achchhe pad par pahunch jaoge
mera yahee upadesh hai ki parae paise ko haraam samajhana
rama ke jee mein aaya ki saaph kah doon apana upadesh aap apane hee lie rakhie yah mere anukool nahin hai
magar itana behaya na tha
dayaanaath ne phir kaha yah jagah to tees roopaye kee thee tumhen bees hee roope mile
ramaanaath nae aadamee ko poora vetan kaise dete shaayad saalchhah maheene mein badh jaay
kaam bahut hai
dayaanaath tum javaan aadamee ho kaam se na ghabadaana chaahie
rama ne doosare din naya soot banavaaya aur phaishan kee kitanee hee cheezen khareedeen
sasuraal se mile hue roopaye kuchh bach rahe the
kuchh mitron se udhaar le lie
vah saahabee thaath banaakar saare daphtar par rob jamaana chaahata tha
koee usase vetan to poochhega nahin mahaajan log usaka thaathbaat dekhakar saham jaenge

vah jaanata tha achchhee aamadanee tabhee ho sakatee hai jab achchha thaath ho sadak ke chaukeedaar ko ek paisa kaaphee samajha jaata hai lekin usakee jagah saarjant ho to kisee kee himmat hee na padegee ki use ek paisa dikhae
phatehaal bhikhaaree ke lie chutakee bahut samajhee jaatee hai lekin gerooe resham dhaaran karane vaale baabaajee ko lajaatelajaate bhee ek roopaya dena hee padata hai
bhekh aur bheekh mein sanaatan se mitrata hai
teesare din rama kotpaint pahanakar aur hait lagaakar nikala to usakee shaan hee kuchh aur ho gaee
chaparaasiyon ne jhukakar salaam kie

ramesh baaboo se milakar jab vah apane kaam ka chaarj lene aaya to dekha ek baraamade mein phatee huee mailee daree par ek miyaan saahab sandook par rajistar phailae baithe hain aur vyaapaaree log unhen chaaron taraph se ghere khade hain
saamane gaadiyon thelon aur ikkon ka baazaar laga hua hai
sabhee apaneapane kaam kee jaldee macha rahe hain
kaheen logon mein gaaleegalauj ho rahee hai kaheen chaparaasiyon mein hanseedillagee
saara kaam bade hee avyavasthit roop se ho raha hai
us phatee huee daree par baithana rama ko apamaanajanak jaan pada

vah seedhe ramesh baaboo se jaakar bola kya mujhe bhee isee mailee daree par bithaana chaahate hain ek achchheesee mez aur kaee kursiyaan bhijavaie aur chaparaasiyon ko hukm deejie ki ek aadamee se jyaada mere saamane na aane paave
ramesh baaboo ne muskaraakar mez aur kursiyaan bhijava deen
rama shaan se kursee par baitha boodhe munsheejee usakee uchchhrnkhalata par dil mein hans rahe the
samajh gae abhee naya josh hai naee sanak hai
chaarj de diya
chaarj mein tha hee kya keval aaj kee aamadanee ka hisaab samajha dena tha
kis jins par kis hisaab se chungee lee jaatee hai isakee chhapee huee taalika maujood thee rama aadha ghante mein apana kaam samajh gaya
boodhe munsheejee ne yadyapi khud hee yah jagah chhodee thee par is vakt jaate hue unhen duhkh ho raha tha
isee jagah vah tees saal se baraabar baithate chale aate the
isee jagah kee badalaut unhonne dhan aur yash donon hee kamaaya tha
use chhodate hue kyon na duhkh hota
chaarj dekar jab vah vida hone lage to rama unake saath jeene ke neeche tak gaya
khaan saahab usakee is namrata se prasann ho gae
muskaraakar bole har ek biltee par ek aana bandha hua hai khulee huee baat hai
log shauk se dete hain
aap ameer aadamee hain magar rasm na bigaadiega
ek baar koee rasm toot jaatee hai to usaka bandhana mushkil ho jaata hai
is ek aane mein aadha chaparaasiyon ka hak hai
jo bade baaboo pahale the vah pachees roopaye maheena lete the magar yah kuchh nahin lete
rama ne aroochi prakat karate hue kaha ganda kaam hai main sagaee se kaam karana chaahata hoon
boodhe miyaan ne hansakar kaha abhee ganda maaloom hota hai lekin phir isee mein maza aaega
khaan saahab ko vida karake rama apanee kursee par aa baitha aur ek chaparaasee se bola in logon se kaho baraamade ke neeche chale jaen
ekek karake nambaravaar aaven ek kaagaj par sabake naam nambaravaar likh liya karo
ek baniya jo do ghante se khada tha khush hokar bola haan sarakaar yah bahut achchha hoga
ramaanaath jo pahale aave usaka kaam pahale hona chaahie
baakee log apana nambar aane tak baahar rahen
yah nahin ki sabase peechhe vaale shor machaakar pahale aa jaen aur pahale vaale khade munh taakate rahen
kaee vyaapaariyon ne kaha haan baaboojee yah intajaam ho jae to bahut achchha ho bhabhbhad mein badee der ho jaatee hai
itana niyantran rama ka rob jamaane ke lie kaaphee tha
vaniksamaaj mein aaj hee usake rangdhang kee aalochana aur prashansa hone lagee
kisee bade kolej ke prophasar ko itanee khyaati umrabhar mein na milatee
dochaar din ke anubhav se hee rama ko saare daanvghaat maaloom ho gae
aiseeaisee baaten soojh gaee jo khaan saahab ko khvaab mein bhee na soojhee theen
maal kee taul ginatee aur parakh mein itanee dhaandhalee thee jisakee koee had nahin
jab is dhaandhalee se vyaapaaree log saikadon kee rakam dakaar jaate hain to rama biltee par ek aana lekar hee kyon santusht ho jaay jisamen aadha aana chaparaasiyon ka hai
maal kee taul aur parakh mein drdhata se niyamon ka paalan karake vah dhan aur keerti donon hee kama sakata hai
yah avasar vah kyon chhodane laga visheshakar jab bade baaboo usake gahare dost the
ramesh baaboo is nae rang eet kee kaarypatuta par mugdh ho gae
usakee peeth thonkakar bole kaayade ke andar raho aur jo chaaho karo
tum par aanch tak na aane paayegee
rama kee aamadanee tezee se badhane lagee
aamadanee ke saath prabhaav bhee badha
sookhee kalam ghisane vaale daphtar ke baabuon ko jab sigaret paan chaay ya jalapaan kee ichchha hotee to rama ke paas chale aate us bahatee ganga mein sabhee haath dho sakate the
saare daphtar mein rama kee saraahana hone lagee
paise ko to vah theekara samajhata hai kya dil hai ki vaah aur jaisa dil hai vaisee hee zabaan bhee
maaloom hota hai nasnas mein sharaaphat bharee huee hai
baabuon ka jab yah haal tha to chaparaasiyon aur muharriron ka poochhana hee kya sabkesab rama ke bina daamon gulaam the
un gareebon kee aamadanee hee nahin pratishtha bhee khoob badh gaee thee
jahaan gaadeevaan tak phatakaar diya karate the vahaan ab achchheachchhe kee gardan pakadakar neeche dhakel dete the
ramaanaath kee tootee bolane lagee
magar jaalapa kee abhilaashaen abhee ek bhee pooree na huee
naagapanchamee ke din muhalle kee kaee yuvatiyaan jaalapa ke saath kajalee khelane aaeen magar jaalapa apane kamare ke baahar nahin nikalee
bhaadon mein janmaashtamee ka utsav aaya
pados hee mein ek sethajee rahate the unake yahaan badee dhoomadhaam se utsav manaaya jaata tha
vahaan se saas aur bahoo ko bulaava aaya
jaageshvaree gaee jaalapa ne jaane se inkaar kiya
in teen maheenon mein usane rama se ek baar bhee aabhooshan kee charcha na kee par usaka yah ekaantprem usake aacharan se uttejak tha
isase jyaada uttejak vah puraana soocheepatr tha jo ek din rama kaheen se utha laaya tha
isamen bhaanti bhaanti ke sundar aabhooshanon ke namoone bane hue the
unake mooly bhee likhe hue the
jaalapa ekaant mein is soocheepatr ko bade dhyaan se dekha karatee
rama ko dekhate hee vah soocheepatr chhipa letee thee
is haardik kaamana ko prakat karake vah apanee hansee na udavaana chaahatee thee
rama aadhee raat ke baad lauta to dekha jaalapa chaarapaee par padee hai
hansakar bola bada achchha gaana ho raha tha
tum nahin gaee badee galatee kee
jaalapa ne munh udhar liya koee uttar na diya
rama ne phir kaha yahaan akele padepade tumhaara jee ghabaraata raha hoga
jaalapa ne teevr svar mein kaha tum kahate ho mainne galatee kee main samajhatee hoon mainne achchha kiya
vahaan kisake munh mein kaalikh lagatee
jaalapa taana to na dena chaahatee thee par rama kee in baaton ne use uttejit kar diya
rosh ka ek kaaran yah bhee tha ki use akelee chhodakar saara ghar utsav dekhane chala gaya
agar un logon ke hraday hota to kya vahaan jaane se inkaar na kar dete
rama ne lajjit hokar kaha kaalikh lagane kee to koee baat na thee sabhee jaanate hain ki choree ho gaee hai aur is zamaane mein dochaar hazaar ke gahane banava lena munh ka kaur nahin hai
choree ka shabd zabaan par laate hue rama ka hraday dhadak utha
jaalapa pati kee or teevr drshti se dekhakar rah gaee
aur kuchh bolane se baat badh jaane ka bhay tha par rama ko usakee drshti se aisa bhaasit hua maano use choree ka rahasy maaloom hai aur vah keval sankoch ke kaaran use kholakar nahin kah rahee hai
use us svapn kee baat bhee yaad aaee jo jaalapa ne choree kee raat ko dekha tha
vah drshti baan ke samaan usake hraday ko chhedane lagee usane socha shaayad mujhe bhamr hua
is drshti mein rosh ke siva aur koee bhaav nahin hai magar yah kuchh bolatee kyon nahin chup kyon ho gaee usaka chup ho jaana hee gajab tha
apane man ka sanshay mitaane aur jaalapa ke man kee thaah lene ke lie rama ne maano dubbee maaree yah kaun jaanata tha ki dolee se utarate hee yah vipatti tumhaara svaagat karegee
jaalapa aankhon mein aansoo bharakar bolee to main tumase gahanon ke lie rotee to nahin hoon
bhaagy mein jo likha tha vah hua
aage bhee vahee hoga jo likha hai
jo auraten gahane nahin pahanateen kya unake din nahin katate
